name: Infinite Dungeons
description:
Infinite Dungeons it's clicker / idle rpg game. Select one of the heroes and descend into dungeon. Hero will be automatically fight with monsters and bosses, collect gold and gain experience points. You can just watch or you can help just by tapping on screen.

Features:

- Select one of various heroes: amazon warrior, human barbarian, elven priestess and half-elf thief. Each hero have different powers and abilities
- Unlock additional heroes: Vampire, Dark Elf, Frost Wizard and others
- Find, craft and enchant equipment for your hero
- Easy to play. Just tap on screen
- Collect powerful artifacts that boosts stats of your hero
- Unlock special dungeon locations. Each location will unlock new game feature like crafting or talent cards
- Reincarnation system that allow you start new game and gain additional bonuses
- Hero will fight with monsters even if you turn off the game
- Play offline. No internet connection requirement

This is fully indie game without any budget and i working on this game alone. So please be kind and patient :) For one person it's need a lot of time to fix bugs and make new game content.

Thanks for playing and supporting!
